thread.title: HECTOR BORBON JR.
thread.title_full: Optima Tax Relief reviewed by HECTOR BORBON JR.

author: HECTOR BORBON JR.
title: HECTOR BORBON JR.
text: Dealing with Optima TR was simple from the beginning to the end. Every person I spoke to was knowledgeable, helpful or courteous. I was guided in all aspects of the process and given the best advice regarding my circumstance. Thank you so much Optima, I have been given a second chance with the IRS. I have also already recommended them to friends of mine.
